name: trip_history_report.report
description: Compute the report rows for the aggregated trip history data for devices & drivers including aggregated distance by trip purpose.

metadata.comment: The Samsara ID for the organization that the object belongs to.
The Samsara ID for the object that the underlying trips correspond to.
The date corresponding to the interval start time.
The type of object that we're reporting against (driver or device).
The timestamp of the start of the hourly interval.
The timestamp of the end of the hourly interval.
The sum of GPS distance in meters recorded during trips for this interval regardless of purpose.
The sum of GPS distance in meters recorded during trips with a 'personal' purpose for this interval.
The sum of GPS distance in meters recorded during trips with a 'work' purpose for this interval.
The sum of GPS distance in meters recorded during trips with a 'commute' purpose for this interval.
The sum of GPS distance in meters recorded during trips with an 'other' purpose for this interval.
The sum of trip durations in milliseconds recorded for trips for this interval.
The count of trips recorded for this interval.
The start time in milliseconds of the last trip for this interval.
